attributes.action: Remove Mugabe and his henchmen from power now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Atrocities continue in Zimbabwe despite all the thousands of petitions and condemnation of this regime by countless hundreds of peaceful organisations.  
The new documentary, secretly recorded in Zimbabwe called Mugabe and the White African, is due to be released internationally and will highlight one of the many issues that Mugabe and his inner circle are responsible for. Things have not changed people are still being hurt intimidated and abused.  Tsvangirai cannot do much, he is tied to Mugabe who will not allow democracy to take hold, he is only playing for time.  This is a charade and cannot work, it is time we all took more affirmative and long lasting action.
Your Government is responsible for what has happened in Zimbabwe, it is time you stepped up to the plate and took responsibility.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
